title: Phil Robertson Got Himself in Trouble with the TSA
description:
Si and the boys talk TSA violations, including Phil's hilarious run-in with an agent and how Godwin got Martin's wife in trouble for carrying contraband. John-David can't take the daylight saving time change, but Martin is ready for a permanent switch, and Godwin is willing to cut a deal. Martin and Si take the contrarian position in the viral debate about whether the world has more doors or wheels, but Godwin and John-David aren't giving an inch. Black panthers make an appearance in the soon-to-be official Duck Call Room bracket. Si reminisces about meeting Steve Harvey. And the boys offer advice on how to deal with death, loss, and anger at God.
-
